Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Relates to taxation and disposition of gaming revenues
Summary: Relates to limits on the slot machine tax rate, and to disposition of gaming revenues at a vendor track located within Oneida county within fifteen miles of a Native American class III gaming facility.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
LawCode: Amd ยง1351, RWB L; amd ยง1612, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law and the tax law, in relation to taxes on gaming revenues
